official_title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt from coverage under that Act individuals who are members of the Old Order Amish.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt from coverage individuals who are members of the Old Order Amish.
